title: Track major npm dependency upgrades
description: Follow up on major/range-blocked npm updates: @types/node (22.19.3 -> 25.x), @types/sinon (17.x -> 21.x), sinon (20.x -> 21.x), @vscode/test-cli (0.0.10 -> 0.0.12).

title: Remove duplicated Workspace interfaces in HydratedTypes
description: HydratedTypes declares Workspace/WorkspaceBody twice; remove duplication to avoid interface merging bugs and keep types clean.

title: Align ZenML minimum version with README and add compatibility doc
description: Set MIN_ZENML_VERSION to match README (0.63.0) and add COMPATIBILITY.md starter matrix.

title: Reduce usage of any in core API types
description: Replace high-risk any fields in core types (ServerInfoTypes, StackTypes, HydratedTypes) with structured types or documented unknowns to reduce API drift.

title: Update dependencies and ZenML min version; run tests
Deduplicate request caching logic in data providers
description: PipelineDataProvider and ModelDataProvider duplicate TTL cache and cleanup logic; consider extracting to shared helper or base to avoid drift.

title: Investigate pygls 2.x / lsprotocol upgrade for ZenML LSP
description: Pinned pygls<2 and lsprotocol<2024 to keep LSP tests green; revisit migration to pygls 2.x and update server/ tests accordingly.
close_reason: Upgraded pygls to 2.0.0 and lsprotocol to 2025.0.0; tests pass.

title: Prune stale bundled libs (duplicate watchdog metadata)
description: Audit bundled/libs for duplicate/stale artifacts (e.g., watchdog 4.0.1 dist-info) and remove older entries to reduce bundle bloat and confusion.

title: Resolve npm audit vulnerabilities after dependency updates
description: npm install reports 2 low and 1 high vulnerabilities; evaluate npm audit fix or targeted updates.
notes: Starting npm audit review and remediation.
close_reason: Applied npm audit fix to update tmp, tar-fs, and brace-expansion; audit clean.
